item.description:
We'll see a great movie and clarify all the characters regarding type and type relationship dynamics - a perfect way to deepen your knowledge of the Enneagram. We'll stop and start the movie to clearly see types and relationship dynamics in the movie, including subtypes. Lots of fun. Dinner and snacks provided!

Vegetarian Dinner 7:00 Movie 8:00

$30, with sliding scale from $30 to $20 based on ability to pay

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. Counseling, has taught over 2000 Enneagram workshops and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living. He is a therapist for individuals, couples and families and does phone sessions as well as home workshops and trainings in groups and organizations.

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies - The Kennedys
